code: import{useRef,useState}from'react';import'./DropDown.css';import button from'./imgs/button1.png';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DropDown=_ref=>{let{container}=_ref;const[clicked,setClicked]=useState(false);const image=useRef();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:e=>{if(clicked){const ele=document.getElementsByClassName(container+'-clicked')[0];ele.className=container;image.current.className='image';setClicked(false);}else{const ele=document.getElementsByClassName(container)[0];ele.className=container+'-clicked';image.current.className='image-clicked';setClicked(true);}},className:"button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{ref:image,src:button,alt:"black triangle",className:"image"})})});};export default DropDown;
